data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Napoli, Marcelo Felgueiras, Cruz, Carlos Alberto Gonçalves, Abreu, Rafael Oliveira De, Del-Grande, Maria Lucia (2011): A new species of Proceratophrys Miranda-Ribeiro (Amphibia: Anura: Cycloramphidae) from the Chapada Diamantina, State of Bahia, northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 3133: 37-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207360
